document_data.name: ''Frost''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Frost''''' was a [[weapon quality]] that could be applied to [[weapon]]s. Once applied, the wielder could sheathe the weapon in freezing cold.
document_data.Powers: A ''frost'' weapon dealt extra cold damage to whoever it struck, but the wielder was immune from the effects of the weapon. If firing from afar with a ''frost'' weapon, with such as a [[crossbow]] or [[longbow]], the ammunition would also have the ''frost'' effect.
document_data.Creation: A spellcaster needed the ''[[chill metal]]'' or ''[[ice storm]]'' spells to create a weapon with this ability.
document_data.Uses: Some experienced [[Thayan gladiator]]s had their horns, claws, and other natural weapons enhanced as weapons of ''frost''.
document_data.Trivia:
* The followers of certain deities — [[Auril]], [[Deep Sashelas]], [[Labelas Enoreth]], [[Mask]], [[Mielikki]], and [[Ulutiu]] — would receive a ''+1 frost'' enchantment from casting the spell ''[[weapon of the deity]]'' and holding that deity's [[favored weapon]]. These weapons were a [[battleaxe]], [[trident]], [[quarterstaff]], [[longsword]], [[scimitar]], and [[longspear]] respectively.

* ''[[Winter's Eye]]'' was an enchanted [[longsword]] of ''frost'' that was lit aflame with multiple ''[[continual flame]]'' spells as a joke and method of misdirection. It belonged to the commander of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] named [[Ellis]] ''circa'' [[1369 DR]].
